LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedBeauty.stages.0.label: <color=#fbef97>That is the RIM!!!</color>
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedBeauty.stages.0.description: The EDGE OF THE WORLD! Here I come!
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedBeauty.stages.1.label: A terrible environment
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedBeauty.stages.1.description: Real blood and human remains everywhere! ! This is so cool, cool, cool, coollllllllllllllllll! !
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedBeauty.stages.2.label: A familiar feeling
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedBeauty.stages.2.description: It's like a protected area in my homeland. Um... It's a little weird.
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedBeauty.stages.3.label: Primeval Life!
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedBeauty.stages.3.description: Just like I thought it would be at first!
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedBeauty.stages.4.label: The life of an Aristocrat
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedBeauty.stages.4.description: It's like a castle in a history book! I love this place!
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedBeauty.stages.5.label: <color=#fbef97>In Magnificent?</color>
LanguageData.AF_TH_NeedBeauty.stages.5.description: Well... I don't like the feeling...
